metadata.title: CVE-2021-41041 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In Eclipse Openj9 before version 0.32.0, Java 8 & 11 fail to throw theexception captured during bytecode verification when verification istriggered by a MethodHandle invocation, allowing unverified methods to beinvoked using MethodHandles.

criterions.comment: eclipse package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
